    Othello
    Capture an Othello game.
    OthelloBoard
    Keep track of all of the tokens on the board.
    OthelloController  
    OthelloControllerBetterVSHuman
    This controller uses the Model classes to allow the Human player P2 to play the computer P1.
    OthelloControllerGreedyVSHuman
    This controller uses the Model classes to allow the Human player P2 to play the computer P1.
    OthelloControllerHumanVSBetter
    This controller uses the Model classes to allow the Human player P1 to play the computer P2.
    OthelloControllerHumanVSGreedy
    This controller uses the Model classes to allow the Human player P1 to play the computer P2.
    OthelloControllerHumanVSHuman
    Run the main from this class to play two humans against eachother.
    OthelloControllerHumanVSRandom
    This controller uses the Model classes to allow the Human player P1 to play the computer P2.
    OthelloControllerRandomVSGreedy
    The goal here is to print out the probability that Random wins and Greedy wins as a result of playing 10000 games against each other with P1=Random and P2=Greedy.
    OthelloControllerRandomVSHuman
    This controller uses the Model classes to allow the Human player P2 to play the computer P1.
    OthelloControllerRandomVSRandom
    Determine whether the first player or second player has the advantage when both are playing a Random Strategy.
    OthelloControllerVerbose  
    OthelloModel  
    Player  
    PlayerBetter
    PlayerBetter chooses a corner if available,otherwise choose a side if available, otherwise choose a space that maximizes the players presence in the middle 4 by 4 square of the board,otherwise choose the location maximizing the movers presence on the board.
    PlayerGreedy
    PlayerGreedy makes a move by considering all possible moves that the player can make.
    PlayerHuman
    TODO: Document this class and make minimal changes as necessary.
    PlayerRandom
    PlayerRandom makes a move by first determining all possible moves that this player can make, putting them in an ArrayList, and then randomly choosing one of them.
    RandomVSRandom  
    TokenVisitor
